# Vivado Project Files - Ignore generated and temporary files

# Vivado log files
*.jou
*.log
*.str

# Vivado backup files
*.backup.*
*.bak
vivado*.backup.*

# Generated directories (these can be huge!)
*.runs/
*.cache/
*.hw/
*.ip_user_files/
*.sim/
*.gen/

# Synthesis and implementation results
*.dcp
*.bit
*.ltx
*.debug
*.rpt
*.vdi

# Generated HDL files
*_stub.v
*_stub.vhdl
*_funcsim.v
*_funcsim.vhdl
*_clocks.xdc
*_ooc.xdc

# Board definition files (if not custom)
*.runs/impl_1/
*.runs/synth_1/

# Vivado project backup
*.xpr.backup.*

# OS generated files
.DS_Store
.DS_Store?
._*
.Spotlight-V100
.Trashes
ehthumbs.db
Thumbs.db

# IDE files
*.swp
*.swo
*~

# Temporary files
*.tmp
*.temp


# Simulation specific files and directories
*.sim/
simulation/
sim/
xsim/
*.wdb
*.wcfg
*.vcd
*.ghw
*.fst
*.tcl~
xelab.*
xsim.*
webtalk*
compile.log
elaborate.log
simulate.log
xvlog.log
xvhdl.log
xelab.log
xsim.log
